titles.title: For the relief of Benjamin Cabrera and Londy Patricia Cabrera.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 12/8/2003--Introduced. Declares that Benjamin Cabrera and Londy Patricia Cabrera shall be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence upon filing the appropriate application.
